amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 116-42 to add findings on the interconnection between climate change and health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Pressley.
